name: BlitzBlasters
description: This game is created using Python and has a better user interface, the style of this is retro and has more, upgraded enemies coming from diffrerent directions everytime. This game is an inspiration from the game, Space Invaders. This game is unlimited and has enemies increasing and shooting lasers as they fall down from the skies of the space. Hope you'll enjoy this game. This is Jitesh signing off, don't forget to subscribe my YouTube channel(https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUb0gKwy6qKlOIeeNa2aVsg?sub_confirmation=1) and put out some donations.
